source.name: Airport Status Web Service
source.description: A web service that allows end-users the ability to query the current known delays in the National Airspace System as well as the current weather from NOAA by airport code.   The user can choose to receive the response in XML or JSON formats suitable for use in interactive web applications.

datasets.name: Airport Status Web Service
datasets.description: A web service that allows end-users the ability to query the current known delays in the National Airspace System as well as the current weather from NOAA by airport code.   The user can choose to receive the response in XML or JSON formats suitable for use in interactive web applications.
